synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Layering n-hexane into the mother solution

synthesis_conditions.note: The synthesis conditions for M- and P-[H6bpy-Yb-(hfac)3] were not explicitly provided in the text. However, it is mentioned that the luminescence and CPL properties of this previously published mononuclear compound were investigated for comparison with those of M- and P-[H6(py)2Yb(hfac)3]n 2.
